dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Feeble creature, what brings you to our domain of darkness?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to bring light back to the Glimmering Reaches.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light? Your futile attempts will be consumed by the shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Defeating Shadowweaver is my destiny.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Destiny? Ha! You will become mere fodder for the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be swayed by your threats!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your foolish bravery will lead to your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps there is another way to find common ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Common ground with the light's champion? Absurd!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The light will prevail against the darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogant fool, the darkness is eternal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will prove you wrong with my actions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions speak louder than words, but yours will be silenced.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us see who truly holds power in this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power? It crumbles before the might of Shadowweaver.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The darkness will never extinguish the light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Naive creature, the light fades in the presence of Shadowweaver.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand as a beacon against your corruption!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A futile gesture in the face of impending doom.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Is there any shred of light left within you?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light? A fleeting memory in this land of shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand the darkness that haunts this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understand? You are not worthy of such knowledge.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Knowledge is the key to finding a resolution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resolution? There is only the darkness and your eventual demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not cower in the face of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a creature on the brink of annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps together we can uncover a path to peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Such notions are foreign to the realm of Shadowweaver.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows hold secrets that must be revealed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Secrets that will remain hidden from the likes of you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will unravel those secrets, one way or another.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You will find only despair in the heart of darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us find a way to coexist in this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? The darkness devours all in the end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking a way to break free from this darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Break free? Your fate is sealed within these shadowed lands.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My will is stronger than the despair that surrounds me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Will alone cannot withstand the eternal night.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight until light pierces through the darkness!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your light will flicker and fade, consumed by the shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Can we not find a glimmer of hope in this darkness?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hope? A fleeting dream in the face of our reality.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we may find a way to escape this endless night.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Escape? There is no escape from Shadowweaver's grasp.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will defy the darkness until my last breath.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your defiance will be your downfall, as it is for all.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps our combined strength can challenge the shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength? It means nothing in the face of oblivion.
